trans-unit.source: Represents a serializable collection of service metadata in XML form.
trans-unit.target: Reprezentuje kolekcję do serializacji metadanych usługi w postaci XML.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> class contains a collection of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> objects, each of which contains one dialect of metadata in XML form.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> Klasy zawiera kolekcję <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> obiektów, z których każdy zawiera jeden dialekt metadanych w postaci XML.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> class is used to pass a group of XML metadata documents to and from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter> objects, such as <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter>.
trans-unit.target: Zazwyczaj <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> klasa jest używana do przekazania grupy dokumentów XML metadanych do i z <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter> i <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter> obiekty, takie jak <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter> i <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter>.

trans-unit.source: To create a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> from a <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> object of type <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Aby utworzyć <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> z <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> typu obiektu <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>, użyj <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.%23ctor%2A> konstruktora.

trans-unit.source: To obtain a <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> object of type <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.MetadataSections%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Aby uzyskać <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> typu obiektu <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>, użyj <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.MetadataSections%2A> właściwości.

trans-unit.source: In addition, you can use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.ReadFrom%2A> method to load a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> from XML data and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.WriteTo%2A> method to write the internal metadata to an XML format.
trans-unit.target: Ponadto można użyć <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.ReadFrom%2A> metodę, aby załadować <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> z danych XML i <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.WriteTo%2A> metodę, aby zapisać wewnętrzny metadanych do formatu XML.

trans-unit.source: This type implements the structure defined in the WS-MetadataExchange specification.
trans-unit.target: Ten typ implementuje struktury zdefiniowane w specyfikacji WS-MetadataExchange.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje nowe wystąpienie klasy <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet" /> klasy.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje nowe wystąpienie klasy <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet" /> klasy.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> object.
trans-unit.target: Tworzy nową <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> obiektu.

trans-unit.source: The metadata values that the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet" /> is to contain.
trans-unit.target: Wartości metadanych <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet" /> musi zawierać.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet" /> class that contains the specified collection of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje nowe wystąpienie klasy <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet" /> klasę, która zawiera określonej kolekcji <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection" /> obiektów.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> from `sections`.
trans-unit.target: Tworzy nowy <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> z `sections`.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlAttribute" /> objects that appear in the serialized form of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet" />.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera kolekcję <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlAttribute" /> obiektów, które są wyświetlane w formie serializacji <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlAttribute" /> objects that appear in the serialized form of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlAttribute" /> Obiektów, które są wyświetlane w formie serializacji <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection" /> objects that represents the metadata.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera kolekcję <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection" /> obiektów, które reprezentuje metadanych.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection" /> objects that represents the metadata.
trans-unit.target: Kolekcja <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection" /> obiektów, które reprezentuje metadanych.

trans-unit.source: The reader to read in XML.
trans-unit.target: Czytnik do odczytu w kodzie XML.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet" /> from the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Zwraca <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet" /> z określonego <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> obiektu.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet" /> that contains all the metadata present in the XML stream.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet" /> zawierający obecny w strumieniu XML metadanych.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> from an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object.
trans-unit.target: Tworzy <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> z <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> obiektu.

trans-unit.source: The reader is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Czytnik jest <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Implements <see cref="M:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.GetSchema" /> method to provide serialization support.
trans-unit.target: Implementuje <see cref="M:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.GetSchema" /> metody, aby zapewnić obsługę serializacji.

trans-unit.source: Returns <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" />.
trans-unit.target: Zwraca <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> object that describes the XML representation of the object that is produced by the <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.System#Xml#Serialization#IXmlSerializable#WriteXml(System.Xml.XmlWriter)" /> method and accessed by the <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.System#Xml#Serialization#IXmlSerializable#ReadXml(System.Xml.XmlReader)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Zwraca <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> obiektu, który opisuje reprezentację XML obiektu, który jest generowany przez <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.System#Xml#Serialization#IXmlSerializable#WriteXml(System.Xml.XmlWriter)" /> — metoda i z niego <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.System#Xml#Serialization#IXmlSerializable#ReadXml(System.Xml.XmlReader)" /> metody.

trans-unit.source: The reader to use when reading XML.
trans-unit.target: Czytnik do użycia podczas odczytywania pliku XML.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <see cref="M:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.ReadXml(System.Xml.XmlReader)" /> method to support deserialization from XML.
trans-unit.target: Implementuje <see cref="M:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.ReadXml(System.Xml.XmlReader)" /> metody do obsługi deserializacji z pliku XML.

trans-unit.source: The reader is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Czytnik jest <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The writer to use when writing XML.
trans-unit.target: Moduł zapisujący używany podczas zapisywania XML.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <see cref="M:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.WriteXml(System.Xml.XmlWriter)" /> method to support serialization to XML.
trans-unit.target: Implementuje <see cref="M:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.WriteXml(System.Xml.XmlWriter)" /> metody do obsługi serializacji XML.

trans-unit.source: The writer is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Moduł zapisujący jest <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The writer to use to write the XML.
trans-unit.target: Moduł zapisujący używany do zapisania pliku XML.

trans-unit.source: Writes the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet" /> to XML using the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: Zapisuje <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet" /> do pliku XML przy użyciu określonego <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />.

trans-unit.source: Writes a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> to an XML stream.
trans-unit.target: Zapisuje <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> w strumieniu XML.

trans-unit.source: The writer is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Moduł zapisujący jest <see langword="null" />.
